com.github.kubeflow.kfserving.pkg.apis.s.description: CustomSpec provides a hook for arbitrary container configuration.
KFService is the Schema for the services API

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

com.github.kubeflow.kfserving.pkg.apis.s.description: KFServiceList contains a list of Service

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

com.github.kubeflow.kfserving.pkg.apis.s.description: KFServiceSpec defines the desired state of KFService

canary.description: Canary defines an alternate configuration to route a percentage of traffic.

com.github.kubeflow.kfserving.pkg.apis.s.description: KFServiceStatus defines the observed state of KFService

conditions.description: Conditions the latest available observations of a resource's current state.

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the 'Generation' of the Service that was last processed by the controller.

com.github.kubeflow.kfserving.pkg.apis.s.description: ModelSpec defines the default configuration to route traffic.

custom.description: The following fields follow a "1-of" semantic. Users must specify exactly one spec.

maxReplicas.description: This is the up bound for autoscaler to scale to

minReplicas.description: Minimum number of replicas, pods won't scale down to 0 in case of no traffic

com.github.kubeflow.kfserving.pkg.apis.s.description: PyTorchSpec defines arguments for configuring PyTorch model serving.

modelClassName.description: Defaults PyTorch model class name to 'PyTorchModel'

resources.description: Defaults to requests and limits of 1CPU, 2Gb MEM.

com.github.kubeflow.kfserving.pkg.apis.s.description: SKLearnSpec defines arguments for configuring SKLearn model serving.

resources.description: Defaults to requests and limits of 1CPU, 2Gb MEM.

com.github.kubeflow.kfserving.pkg.apis.s.description: StatusConfigurationSpec describes the state of the configuration receiving traffic.
TensorRTSpec defines arguments for configuring TensorRT model serving.

resources.description: Defaults to requests and limits of 1CPU, 2Gb MEM.

com.github.kubeflow.kfserving.pkg.apis.s.description: TensorflowSpec defines arguments for configuring Tensorflow model serving.

resources.description: Defaults to requests and limits of 1CPU, 2Gb MEM.

com.github.kubeflow.kfserving.pkg.apis.s.description: XGBoostSpec defines arguments for configuring XGBoost model serving.

resources.description: Defaults to requests and limits of 1CPU, 2Gb MEM.
